text:
CA Recall 🧵
Latest @PPICNotes poll affirms what next few polls will likely find, the NO vote is over 50% and #CARecall loses by 10 points (or more) w/ strongest NO vote from Latino, AAPI, Black voters.  CA voters are just now digging in so now is the key time for outreach and... https://t.co/FO1DXxqt7g
